files.patch:
@@ -179,6 +179,0 @@
-  # Always bundle the library if we are building static java.
-  if test "x${STATIC_JAVA}" = "xtrue"; then
-    DEFAULT_ZLIB=bundled
-    ZLIB_FOUND=no
-  fi
-
@@ -199,3 +193,0 @@
-    if test "x${STATIC_JAVA}" = "xtrue"; then
-      AC_MSG_ERROR([--with-zlib=system does not work with --with-static-java=yes]) 
-    fi

@@ -38,4 +38,0 @@
-  if test "x${STATIC_JAVA}" = "xtrue"; then
-    FOUND_FREETYPE=no
-  fi
-
@@ -112,2 +108,1 @@
-      test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" != "xaix" && \
-      test "x${STATIC_JAVA}" != "xtrue"; then
+      test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" != "xaix"; then
@@ -118,3 +113,0 @@
-      if test "x${STATIC_JAVA}" = "xtrue"; then
-        AC_MSG_ERROR([--with-freetype=system does not work with --with-static-java=yes])
-      fi
